snippet: Mark Cavendish of Britain won the 128-mile second stage of the Giro d’Italia in a sprint finish in Herning, Denmark.
abstract: British cyclist Mark Cavendish second stage of Giro d'Italia bicycle race; American Taylor Phinney keeps overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish of Britain won the 128-mile second stage of the Giro d’Italia in a sprint finish in Herning, Denmark.

headline.seo: Phinney Keeps Overall Lead in the Giro
headline.main: Phinney Keeps Overall Lead in the Giro
headline.print_headline: Phinney Keeps Overall Lead in the Giro
